phrs.translation: 使徒的, 罗马教皇的
宗座宫殿, 教皇宫, 宗座殿
使徒教父, 使徒后期教父
宗座监牧, 详细翻译

sentences.sentence: He saw his vocation as one of prayer and apostolic work.
sentences.translation: 他把祷告和从事基督使徒的工作视为自己的使命。

sentences.sentence: He was appointed Apostolic Administrator of Minsk by Pope John Paul II.
sentences.translation: 他被教皇约翰-保罗二世任命为明斯克的宗座署理。

sentences.sentence: So this is a post-apostolic letter.
sentences.translation: 因此说明这封信是后使徒时代的。
